responsibilities: Gather requirements from business and IT users.
Design, develop, and implement chatbot and voicebot agents using Azure cloud services and Genesys.
Interface and liaise with business partners and potentially external vendors.
Develop working application code for a cloud environment based on business functions and technical specifications.
Embed chatbots in multiple channels such as websites, SMS, email, Skype, and others.
required_skills: Understanding of NLP and NLU concepts including Intent Classification and Entity Extraction.
Basic knowledge of Machine Learning concepts.
Development skills in NodeJS and REST services.
Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
Knowledge of software development phases including UI design, APIs, and microservices.
Hands-on experience with JavaScript frameworks such as NodeJS and ReactJS or VueJS.
Knowledge of analytics and visualization tools.
preferred_skills: Experience with AI technologies like NLP, Speech to Text, and others.
Knowledge of AI platforms like IBM Watson and Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services.
Experience in a DevOps environment and with tools like Git and Jira.
Web UI and dashboard design experience.
education_requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experience.
experience_required: Minimum 3 years of experience with Chatbot technologies and AI use case solutioning.

matching_criteria.skill: Experience with cloud services and storage
